name: Mechs
description:
Destroy the robot base! Prioritize between deploying units and increasing how much money you can hold. Beware the Gigabot...

This is a submission for the 2019 Shenanijam. I was only able to spend about 10 hours working on the game (as opposed to the usual 48), so it came out unpolished (placeholder art only & unbalanced), but it's my first time submitting a playable game to a jam, and I tackled some good challenges, so I consider it a success!

The theme I went with was "Wrenches 101" and my Achievement List is limited to one - "Maverick".
